duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute comprehensive SEO strategies to improve organic search rankings and drive targeted traffic to our websites and digital platforms.
Perform thorough keyword research to identify opportunities for content optimization and creation.
Optimize on-page elements such as meta tags, headings, URLs, and content to align with targeted keywords and improve search visibility.
Collaborate with content creators to develop high-quality, SEO-friendly content that addresses user intent and enhances the user experience.
Analyze and report on the performance of SEO efforts, using data-driven insights to continuously improve strategies.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
